# Lists of countries by mineral production

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

Jump to navigation Jump to search

The following list creates a summary of the two major producers of different
minerals (and [coal](/wiki/Coal "Coal"), which is generally not considered a
[mineral](/wiki/Mineral "Mineral")).

## Contents

  * 1 Fuels
    * 1.1 Fossil fuels
    * 1.2 Nuclear fuel
  * 2 Gemstones
  * 3 Metals
  * 4 References
